author.title: Digital Marketing Specialist | Performance Marketer | SEO & Paid Ads Expert | Helping Brands Grow with Data-Driven StrategiesDigital Marketing Specialist | Performance Marketer | SEO & Paid Ads Expert | Helping Brands Grow with Data-Driven Strategies

content: 🚀 𝗥𝗲𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗸𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗦𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵 𝗖𝗮𝗺𝗽𝗮𝗶𝗴𝗻𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗚𝗼𝗼𝗴𝗹𝗲 𝗔𝗜 𝗠𝗮𝘅 – 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗙𝘂𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗶𝘀 𝗛𝗲𝗿𝗲!This week, Google introduced a powerful update that’s set to change how we run search campaigns forever – say hello to Max Search Campaigns powered by Google AI! 🎯🔍 With features like:✅ Broad Match & Keywordless Technology to expand reach✅ Text Customisation & Final URL Expansion for higher relevance✅ Advanced Controls – from brand/location to asset-level transparency✅ In-depth Reporting on spend, conversions, headlines & URLSThis is the all-in-one upgrade we’ve been waiting for.📈 Brands using mostly exact & phrase match keywords could see a 27% boost in conversions at similar CPA/ROAS. That’s a game-changer for non-retail advertisers too!💡 As a digital marketer, I’m genuinely excited to see how these advancements will streamline campaign management and supercharge performance with just one click.👀 hashtag#GML2025 was 🔥 and this update proves AI in search is not just a trend, it’s the new standard.Curious to explore how this could impact your business? Let’s talk AI + Search!hashtag#GoogleAds hashtag#SearchCampaigns hashtag#DigitalMarketing hashtag#GoogleMarketingLive hashtag#AIinAdvertising hashtag#PerformanceMax hashtag#PPC
